contextId.information: The phrase "exchanged their natural functions" is a euphemism for immoral sexuality. AT: "started practicing sexuality in a way God did not design" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: exchanged their natural functions for what is against nature

contextId.information: Paul encourages the Roman believers to give to Phoebe anything she needs. AT: "and help her by giving her whatever she needs" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
